verses.verse: The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> [were] <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> [were] <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> <S%H9116>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%> [were] <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> [were] <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
<S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> [and] <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H50>Abishua,<s%>
and <S%H50>Abishua<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1231>Bukki,<s%> and <S%H1231>Bukki<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%>
and <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2228>Zerahiah,<s%> and <S%H2228>Zerahiah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%>
<S%H4812>Meraioth<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> and <S%H568>Amariah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%>
and <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H290>Ahimaaz,<s%>
and <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3076>Johanan,<s%>

and <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> (it was he <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3547>served<s%> as the <S%H3547>priest<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>),
and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> and <S%H568>Amariah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%>
and <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%>
and <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> and <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%>
and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8304>Seraiah,<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak;<s%>

and <S%H3087>Jehozadak<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> [along] when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> by <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> [were] <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom:<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> [were] <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> <S%H9116>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> [were] <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their fathers' [households.]
Of <S%H1647>Gershom:<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2155>Zimmah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H3098>Joah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2979>Jeatherai<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> [were] <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7141>Korah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H617>Assir<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H511>Elkanah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H43>Ebiasaph<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H617>Assir<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H8480>Tahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H222>Uriel<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> [were] <S%H6022>Amasai<s%> and <S%H287>Ahimoth.<s%>
[As for] <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> [were] <S%H6689>Zophai<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H5184>Nahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H446>Eliab<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> [were] <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> the first-born and <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> the <S%H8145>second.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> [were] <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H9396>Uzzah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H8092>Shimea<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2293>Haggiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are those <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3027>service<s%> of <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H4494>rested<s%> [there.]

And they <S%H8334>ministered<s%> with <S%H7892>song<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and they <S%H5975>served<s%> in their <S%H5656>office<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to their <S%H4941>order.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are those who <S%H5975>served<s%> with their <S%H1121>sons.<s%> From the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> [were] <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H7891>singer,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H447>Eliel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8430>Toah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4287>Mahath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8480>Tahath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H617>Assir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H43>Ebiasaph,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And [Heman's] <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> even <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimea,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1202>Baaseiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H867>Ethni,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H387>Ethan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2155>Zimmah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3189>Jahath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And on the <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> [were] their <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari:<s%> <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7029>Kishi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5660>Abdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4409>Malluch,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H558>Amaziah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H557>Amzi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer,<s%>
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4187>Mushi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And their <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H5414>appointed<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

But <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6999>offered<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>place,<s%> and to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron:<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H50>Abishua<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H1231>Bukki<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2228>Zerahiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H4812>Meraioth<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H568>Amariah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H6659>Zadok<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H4186>settlements<s%> according to their <S%H2918>camps<s%> within their <S%H1366>borders.<s%> To the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> (for <S%H1992>theirs<s%> was the [first] <S%H1486>lot<s%>),
to them they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it;
but the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and its <S%H9161>villages,<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh.<s%>

And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> the [following] <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge:<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> also with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H3492>Jattir,<s%> <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H2432>Hilen<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
<S%H6228>Ashan<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> and Beth-shemesh with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands;<s%>

and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H5964>Allemeth<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> and <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

Then to the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> [were given] by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> from the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> from the <S%H2677>half-tribe<s%>, the half of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> [were given] from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

To the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> [were given] by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Now <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H1366>territory<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them the [following] <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge:<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> also with its <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands,<s%>
